actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Biggs amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Biggs.

description: An amendment numbered 101 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prevent funds from being used to finalize, implement, or enforce the draft guidance issued by the Food and Drug Administration in December of 2017 titled Drug Products Labeled as Homeopathic: Guidance for FDA Staff and Industry.
purpose: An amendment numbered 101 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prevent funds from being used to finalize, implement, or enforce the draft guidance issued by the Food and Drug Administration in December of 2017 titled Drug Products Labeled as Homeopathic: Guidance for FDA Staff and Industry.
